ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: The core systems of Skyve have been changed, organised, and optimised.
Excluded mods no longer use the '.excluded' file, they instead use a new ModConfig file.
The Load Order of mods has been re-integrated, and is completely automated based on mods' requirements as well as other Compatibility-Report factors.
Improved the author info gathering, which will fix the issue of authors not loading.
